author: Special Correspondent
text:
RELIGION

The Vedapatashala Jagathguru Sri Jayendra Saraswathi Trust: Programme on ‘Hamasavahini Venna Sawaswathi Alangaram,’ Sri Annapoorneshwari temple, R.S. Puram, 9 a.m.

Sri Hamuath Jayanthi Mahotsava Committee: Aradhana Mahotsavam, Sri Narashimha Acharya Kothe, Sri Raghavandra swamy Brindavanam, Sullivan Street, 6 p.m.

Sri Rathna Vinayakar Temple: Chathurthi, D.B. Road, R.S. Puram, 8.30 a.m.

Varasidhi Vinayakar, Varadaraja Perumal, Varada Anjaneyar Mahalakshmi Temples: Samvadssarabishga Peruvizha, 5 a.m.

GENERAL

KGISL Institute of Information Management: Conference on ‘Advance computing and IT applications,’ 10 a.m.

Masonic Medical Centre for Children: Clinical meeting, 8.30 a.m.

P.S.G.R. Krishnammal College for Women: Seminar on ‘Regional Indian literature in translation,’ 8.30 a.m.

Kumaraguru College of Technology: Inter-Collegiate Techno Cultural festival, 9.30 a.m.

AJK College of Arts and Science: Seminar on ‘ Academic and administration audit,’ 9.30 a.m.

S.N.R. Sons College: Graduation day, 10 a.m.

Build Intec: Building and construction trade fair, Codissia, 10 a.m.

SNS College of Technology: Seminar on ‘Cloud computing,’ 10 a.m.

Indian Association of Neonatal Nurses: Conference on ‘Champions for survival neonates,’ 9:30 a.m.

Dr. R.V. Arts College and Science: Conference on ‘Computing technologies and its applications,’ 10 a.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: Symposium, 10 a.m.

Dr. N.G.P Arts and Science College: Talk on ‘Floral and cultural diversity of Andaman & Nicobar Islands,’ 10 a.m.

Nirmala College for Women: Seminar on ‘Echo of mathematics,’ 10 a.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: National productivity day and productivity week inauguration, 9.30 a.m.

The Amateur Athletic Sports Association: Athletic events for children and Sri G. Vardaraj Memorial Sports, PSG Medical College,

7.30 a.m.

PSG Institute of Technology and Applied Research: Workshop on ‘Fundamentals of data analysis,’

8.30 a.m.

Gandhian Institutions: 68th Sarvodaya Mela, Thevar Mandapam, Perur, 8 a.m.

UDHAGAMANDALAM

Tamil Nadu Orthopaedic Association: Conference, Sterling hotel, 6 p.m.

Bird Count India: The Great Backyard Bird Count, 8.30 a.m.

TIRUPUR

Angel College of Engineering: Workshop on ‘Mobile application development using android,’ 9.30; seminar on ‘Life skill development,’ 10.30 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
